children.name: Fakku
children.short: The largest English hentai publisher in the world.
contents: Fakku is the largest English-language hentai publisher in the world. Thousands of uncensored English hentai manga, comics, and doujinshi available. Fakku was originally an aggregator that provided users with scanlations of adult manga and d≈çjinshi from Japan
